descriptions.description: Libxml2 is the XML C parser and toolkit developed for the Gnome project (but usable outside of the Gnome platform).

flag.name: libiconv
flag.info: Needed for character set conversion purposes.

set.commands:
PACKAGE_NAME=libxml2 PACKAGE_VERSION=2.9.1
oegimport libiconv oegimport gettext oegimport zlib
oegextract libxml2
configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --with-sysroot=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --with-gnu-ld --with-zlib=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --with-iconv=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --bindir=${OEG_BASE_BIN_DIR} --libdir=${OEG_BASE_LIB_DIR} --without-python ${CONFIGURE_HOST_PARA} # ohne: --with-lzma= --with-icu make make install-strip DESTDIR=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}
cd "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}"
mv bin/*.dll bin64/ rm -rf bin # TODO: Do we need to edit the .la files in lib64?
oegarchive ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}
